definitions.definition: A form of land tenure and small-scale food production , unique to the Highlands and islands of Scotland , in which individual crofts are established on the better land while a large area of poor-quality hill ground is shared by all the crofters of the township for grazing .
The process of exposing linen to the sun, on the grass, in the process of bleaching .

main_definition: A form of land tenure and small-scale food production , unique to the Highlands and islands of Scotland , in which individual crofts are established on the better land while a large area of poor-quality hill ground is shared by all the crofters of the township for grazing .
secondary_definitions: The process of exposing linen to the sun, on the grass, in the process of bleaching .
